Saturday, 29 April 2023

at SPXLXNKX [Leipzig-Plagwitz]
ğŸ¦£ ğŸ¦– ğŸ¢ ğŸŒ‹ ğŸ²
on stage:
Pieuvre {Brln}
Berlin trio patching together raw-no wavey guitar, a punk-funk like rhythm session and well-crafted vocal melodies.
Untel {Fr}
The music Untel generates is an odd one, a threshold towards some sunken worlds, some would say, or the celebrating of an unknown deity's wedding
PLS {Fr}
PLS is an electronic trio 100% machines. They propose a music at the crossroads of several styles between melodic synths, techno rhythms and saturated songs.
Fatique Suspecte {Lpz}
A duo combining experimental breakcore/techno with ambient and noise undertones, equally matching for outdoor raves and the dirty basement in some diy punk squat.
